author: Sports Desk
title: PSL makes yet more history
text:
Share Tweet Email League decides to use DRS for play-offs. PHOTO COURTESY: PSL 
Pakistan Super League (PSL) has become the first T20 league in cricket to use Decision Review System (DRS) in the play-off round. 
PSL’s chairman made the announcement via his official Twitter account saying, “Another first from HBL PSL. DRS to be used in the playoff matches.” Another first from #HBLPSL . DRS to be used in the #HBLPSL playoff matches. 
It’s final. PSL final to be held in Lahore 
The decision comes in the wake of criticism of league officials for making poor on-field calls in the ongoing tournament. 
The play-off round, which includes three matches, begins today with the tie between Peshawar Zalmi and Quetta Gladiators in Sharjah.
